about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the enchanting realm of Elfenberg, a city-building adventure set within the verdant domains of the High Elves. Here, you shall nurture a fledgling elven settlement, guiding its growth into a magnificent wonder while carefully harmonizing the needs of your people with the rhythms of nature.



As the architect of the burgeoning realm of Elfenberg, it is up to you to shape its destiny through the selection and placement of cards. Some cards will come into your hands by chance, while others grant you the power of choice. With foresight and wisdom as your guides, you must carefully choose and place the cards to maintain the delicate balance of your growing domain and lead Elfenberg to eternal greatness.


The positioning of your structures holds profound significance. Production edifices thrive when erected near sources of precious resources, their output dwindling as the distance grows. Yet heed also the call of the natural world, ensuring your blossoming city coexists in harmony with the flora and fauna that grace its borders.



Three distinct populations grace Elfenberg with their presence - the industrious Commoners, the erudite Mages, and the noble Aristocracy. Each has their own desires and necessities, both shared and unique. By answering their needs, you shall witness humble cottages transform into sanctuaries befitting their esteemed stature.

name: Elfenberg

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1050
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2050
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Step into the realm of elves in this magical city-builder! Instantly place buildings with cards, choose wisely, and maintain a delicate balance of resources, city development, and harmony with nature in your surroundings.
